title.en: A collection of photographs of Merched y Wawr Rhyl, Colwyn.
title.cy: Penwythnos Preswyl Merched y Wawr - Llanbedr Pont Steffan, Medi 1992. Merched y Wawr Rhyl, Rhanbarth Colwyn.

description.en: Rhai o aelodau Cangen y Rhyl ym mhenwythnos Preswyl Merched y Wawr - Llanbedr Pont Steffan, Medi 1992. Gwelwn: (cefn) Elin Owen, Eirlys Lewis Evans, Olwen Griffiths, Eunice Hughes, Joan Davies, (canol) Elna Willimas, Ann Elwyn Jones, Enid Harris, Meirys Hughes Jones, Margareth Roberts (Dyserth), (blaen) Glenys Thomas.
